avdta.vehicle.route

Class FixedPath

  • java.lang.Object
    • avdta.vehicle.route.FixedPath
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RouteChoice

    public class FixedPath
extends java.lang.Object
implements RouteChoice
    This represents a fixed route choice: the Vehicle chooses a Path before entering the network, and follows the Path exactly until reaching the destination.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      int path_idx 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FixedPath(Path path)
      Constructs this FixedPath around the given Path.

      • enteredLink

        public void enteredLink(Link l)
        Called when the associated Vehicle enters the given Link. Increments the path pointer. Note that the Link entered must be the next Link on the fixed Path to maintain proper tracking.
        Specified by:
        enteredLink in interface RouteChoice
        Parameters:
        l - the Link entered

      • getOrigin

        public Node getOrigin()
        Returns the origin Node. This is the source Node of the first Link on the Path
        Specified by:
        getOrigin in interface RouteChoice
        Returns:
        the origin Node

      • getDest

        public Node getDest()
        Returns the destination Node. This is the destination Node of the last Link on the Path
        Specified by:
        getDest in interface RouteChoice
        Returns:
        the destination Node
